title: Proceed to the blue desk please
creator_credit: Simone West, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Simone West juxtaposes the urgency of processing child patients that are suffering from burns with the sense of urgency that assail the loved ones that want everything to be ok.
